sstate:
Use this file to define custom functions and blocks.
Read more at https://makecode.microbit.org/blocks/custom

sstate blocks
icon: a Unicode identifier for an icon from the Font Awesome icon set.
http://fontawesome.io/icons
sstate.defineDo|param|body: code to run on DO every interval time.
sstate.defineEntry|param|body: code to run on ENTRY. prevName is a previous state name.
sstate.defineExit|param|body: code to run on EXIT. nextName is a next state name.
sstate.defineState|param|name: state name, is assigned to the stateName variable
